title: The Thirteenth Guest (restored, colorized) (1932, mystery, imdb score: 5.7)

sources.title: The Thirteenth Guest (restored, colorized) (1932, mystery, imdb score: 5.7)
sources.description: The Thirteenth Guest is a 1932 American pre-Code mystery comedy thriller film, released on August 9, 1932. The film is also known as Lady Beware in the United Kingdom . It is based on the 1929 novel The Thirteenth Guest written by crime fiction author Armitage Trail , best known for the novel Scarface on which the 1932 movie of the same name was based. The novel was filmed again in 1943 as Mystery of the 13th Guest .
